achievements.description: I always put in maximum effort to achieve goals setout by myself or the company and strive to consistenly meet deadlines with quality work.
I excell in challenging environments where I can come up with unique solutions whether it be in a group or solo project
I have experience creating a IoT device that can send data to and from the cloud through Microsoft Azure
